channel.title: Need help with login message
channel.description:
ok im in need of how to get server to show in chat box who logs in can someone please help me asap
i want it to show the players names in chat as they login to server. its on a 317
the source is Sinatra

item.title: Need help with login message
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:

Do you want to send a global message? If yes use snipers. If you want to send the message to the player use:

sendMessage("Welcome to +CONFIG_SERVER_NAME+ " +playerName+ ");

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with login message
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:479283”]for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=1934882>" +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } }
Add that in the initialize method in your Client class. If you want it say when they log out, just add the same thing in the logout method.[/quote]nice for:o

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with login message
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=1934882>" +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } }
Add that in the initialize method in your Client class. If you want it say when they log out, just add the same thing in the logout method.

Read full topic
